comment:
Aroma - spicy, sour
Taste - cinnamon, sweet 
Finish - short finish with a slight burn

Ohio Dept. of Liquor Control delisted this juice so I've been picking these up for $21.00 lately. it's a nice mellow theater that doesn't linger long in the tongue with tastes of light oak and Carmel, but it's not very complex. while it's what what I've been paying for it I still would like to see what develops with more time on the barrel.
Light.  Easy sipper.  Nothing bad very one note , generic one note bourbon flavor.  little to no bite.
